name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior P&C Engineer with a robust background in protection control and substation design, leveraging 10+ years of experience to deliver secure and compliant high-voltage solutions. Demonstrated expertise in relay coordination and adherence to standards such as NESC and IEEE. Skilled in the use of engineering software tools including **ASPEN**, **CAPE**, and **ETAP** for advanced system analysis and design evaluations. Proven ability to implement protection schemes and conduct thorough fault study analyses to ensure the reliability of electrical infrastructure. 

Additionally, I possess strong analytical skills and a foundational knowledge of SCADA systems, comfortably managing real-time monitoring and control environments. Passionate about fostering innovations that improve system resilience and operational efficiency.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed protection control strategies for high-voltage systems, ensuring compliance with **IEEE** and **NESC** standards, while implementing relay coordination across substations.
• Developed and maintained substation design solutions utilizing **ASPEN** and **CAPE** software tools, with an emphasis on efficiency and reliability in electrical systems.
• Conducted thorough testing and validation of protective relay settings and configurations using **ETAP** and **SEL** systems, achieving a 99% uptime in monitored substations.
• Spearheaded the integration of advanced SCADA systems for real-time monitoring and control, enhancing operational visibility and reducing response times by an average of **30%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to assess and mitigate risks in electrical protection schemes, resulting in a **15%** reduction in system faults over **12 months**.
• Developed detailed documentation and training materials for engineers on protection control protocols and new technologies.
• Conducted field assessments and audits on existing protection systems, providing actionable insights to improve overall safety and effectiveness, leading to a compliance rate of **100%** during regulatory reviews.

Applied advanced protection control techniques and relay coordination methodologies to enhance the reliability of high-voltage distribution systems.
Utilized **ETAP** and **ASPEN** software for the design and analysis of substations, ensuring compliance with **IEEE** and **NESC** standards, resulting in a 30% increase in system safety.
Conducted SCADA system integrations to optimize real-time monitoring and control of power systems, leveraging extensive data analytics for predictive maintenance and operational efficiency.
Performed detailed fault studies and coordination studies, implementing relay settings and operation strategies that improved protection response times by **25%**.
Engaged in the design and testing of protection schemes for over **9 substations**, ensuring stringent adherence to safety regulations and operational effectiveness.
Developed comprehensive documentation and training materials for the implementation of protective systems, resulting in a **40%** improvement in team competency on new systems and technologies.
Utilized SEL devices for relay protection and automation, streamlining processes for troubleshooting and system restoration, reducing downtime by **15%**.

Applied role-based access control (RBAC) principles to ensure secure customer and admin access, enhancing platform protection and compliance with GDPR standards.
Engineered high-voltage substation designs, utilizing **ETAP** and **ASPEN** tools to optimize power distribution and relay coordination in compliance with **IEEE** and **NESC** standards.
Leveraged **CAPE** and **SEL** software for SCADA system integration, providing real-time monitoring and control capabilities for improved operational efficiency.
Conducted relay coordination studies to enhance protection control metrics, ensuring the reliability of high-stakes electrical infrastructure.
Designed and optimized backend workflows using modern frameworks and languages, enhancing application performance and scalability.
Collaborated on projects ensuring compliance with national safety standards, mitigating risks in the design and implementation of electrical systems.
Executed detailed analysis and reporting, achieving a reduction in downtime by **25%** through effective relay configurations and monitoring solutions.
Served as a key contributor in developing innovative solutions for protection and control challenges in **SEL** systems, effectively reducing response times by **30%**.
Participated in continuous improvement initiatives, leading to a **15%** increase in project delivery speed and stakeholder satisfaction.
